text: But while they prate of economic laws, men and women are starving. We must lay hold of the fact that economic laws are not made by nature. They are made by human beings.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

text: Adversity causes some men to break others to break records.
author: William Arthur Ward

text: I think the part of media that romanticizes criminal behavior, things that a person will say against women, profanity, being gangster, having multiple children with multiple men and women and not wanting to is prevalent. When you look at the majority of shows on television they placate that kind of behavior.
author: Bill Cosby

text: Some men can live up to their loftiest ideals without ever going higher than a basement.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

text: Tears are often the telescope by which men see far into heaven.
author: Henry Ward Beecher
